cards.header: Ni gute ibiyago digital vyanje binshira mukibazo

cards.text:
## Muriyi nyigisho uzokwiga:
• Nubuhe bwoko bw'ibiyago bushobora gukurikiranwa
• Ingene ibiyago vyo ku materefone ngendanwa bikurikiranwa
• Ingene wokwirinda gukurikiranwa iyo bishoboka

Kuba umumenyeshamakuru akora neza bikenerwa yuko ukoresha uburyo bwinshi bwo guhanahana amakuru. Uburyo bwoguhanahana amakuru bumenyerewe bisaga inzira ishobora gukoreshwa nabo bakubangamiye canke babangamiye abaguha amakuru. 
Mutumbero yogutunganya inkuru, ushobora gusiga inzira ya digital ifasha abo bakubangamiye canke babangamiye abaguha amakuru.
Gutahura neza inzira isigwa n'ibiyago vyawe niyo ntambwe yambere ugira kugira wihumurize yuko abo bakubangamiye batazoshobora kukugirira nabi canke bagirire nabi abaguha amakuru.

![Guhanahana amakuru m'uburyo bwa electronique](2.png)
Inzira zisanzwe zose zo guhanahana amakuru m'uburyo bwa electronique zirafise ibimenyetso bisigara (trace). Guhanahana amakuru m'uburyo bwa electronique bigizwe n'uburyo bwinshi butandukanye:
• Ihamagara
• Ubutumwa bwanditse (SMS / MMS)
• Email
• Ivya Voice over IP(VoIP) nka Skype canke Google Hangout
• Gukoresha navigateur
• Gukoresha réseau social

Guhanahana amakuru muburyo bwa electronique vyisunga vyose inzira imwe. Ikiyago gihera kumuntu umwe, kigafata inzira ica mu muhora, kigashikira umuntu wundi wakabiri. 
Ubwoko bw'ingorane zitewe no guhanahana amakuru buvana na systeme iriko irakoreshwa.

![Gukurikiranwa kw'ibiyago vyokuri terefone ngendanwa](3.png)
### Gukurikiranwa kw'ibiyago vyokuri terefone ngendanwa
Ibiyago biciye ku mihora ya terefone ngendanwa bikenera ivyo bita systeme passif ituma terefone y'uwukoresha, par défaut, yinjizwa mu muhora.

![Gukurikiranwa kwa email kuri ISP hamwe na gateway national](4.png)
### Gukurikiranwa kwa email kuri ISP hamwe na gateway national
Gukoresha nagivateur, email, VoIP, n'ibiyago vya réseau social vyamye bikenera yuko uwubikoresha yinjira neza mu muhora imbere yuko guhanahana amakuru bitangura.

![Ibikorwa vyo guhanahana amakuru](5.png)
Uko abakoresha bagenda biyongera mu gukenera terefone zabo kuma données hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo guhanahana amakuru, ibi biyago vyose bitangura gukenera ivyo bita communication passive. Naho ubwirirzwa gufa ingingo yo guhanahana amakuru kuri réseau socail canke kuronka email kuri ordinateur, terefone yawe izoronka irihanahana ry'amakuru par défaut, igihe bitanguye.

![Terefone ngendanwa](6.png)
Ihweze urwo rutonde rw'ibikoresho bifasha kugumana ukutashira ahabona n'ukutamenywa igihe utanguye ibiyago vya electronique. Inyigisho zohanyuma zizosigura imigendere myiza ku bwoko bwose bwoguhanahana amakuru.
### Ibikoresho bihanuwe gukoresha
• kuri SMS: TextSecure
• kuri VoIP/ihamagara: OSTel / CSipSimple canke Redphone
• Guhanahana amakuru atawukuzi: Orbot
• Ukoresha navigateur: Orweb
• uri kuri Chat: ChatSecure
• kuri Email: K9Mail
• kuri Notes: NoteCipher
• Ubunyegezabanga (mot de passe): KeePassDroid

cards.header: Ni gute terefone ngendanwa vyanje inshira mukibazo

cards.text:
![Terefone na SIM](8.png)
Ukwari bibiri, ikarata SIM na terefone ngendanwa vyawe bishobora kumenyekanisha uwo uriwe. Ibiyago vyose vya terefone yawe biciye k'umuhora wa terefone yawe ---- waba uriko urahamagara canke baguhamaga, kurungika ubutumwa, gukoresha navigatuer kuri web, canke kuguma uri kuri internet ---vyose bituma hamenyekana ivyerekeye terefone n'ikarata SIM.

## Ni gute ikarata SIM yonyononera?
![Idonido y'ikarata SIM ](9.png)
Iyo bita ikarata ya Subscriber Identity Module (SIM) ibika ivyerekeye umuntu yiyandikisha ngwakoresha terefone. Ivyo nivyo uwuntanga ubwo buryo (fournisseur) akoresha kugira amenye uwo uriwe, hisunzwe ibikuranga canke impapuro watanze mukwiyandikisha.

## Ni gute terefone ngendanwa yanje yonyononera?
![Akarorero k'inomero ya IMEI](10.png)
Ikarata SIM irakumenya, mugabo terefone ngendanwa yawe irashobora kugutera ingorane. Terefone ngendanwa yose ifise inomero yisangije, yitwa International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI). Iyi nomero ishobora gukurikiranwa umwanya wariwo wose.
Ihweze terefone ngendanwa yawe kugira ubone iyo IMEI (kenshi iherereye inyuma y'ibateri) canke ufyonde *#06# muri terefone yawe kugira ubone inomero terefone ngendanwa yawe yisangije.

Ushobora kwibaza yuko ikarata SIM yawe ariyo nzira yonyene uwutanga umuhora canke inzego zishobora gucako mukukumenya canke mukugukurikirana mukibanza urimwo. Abantu benshi barahindura ama karata SIM yabo mugabo bakabandanya bakoresha ya terefone nyene. Iri nikosa. Bifatanije, ikarata SIM yawe (ariyo ikumenya) hamwe n'inomero ya IMEI (ariyo imenya terefone yawe) bituma umenyekana kandi ukirikiranwa igihe cose. 
Iterefone ngendanwa yawe igihe cose iguma yandika ikibanza urimwo kuri antenne ya terefone yose winjiyeko. Kuramwo ibateri yawe canke usige terefone yawe muhira nyamba udashaka gukurikiranwa.

## Ni gute terefone yanje yerekana ikabanza ndimwo?
![Triangulation](11.png)
Igihe terefone ngendanwa yawe yugaye, uwutanga umuhora arazi ikibanza urimwo, akoresheje ivya Triangulation vyama antenne arihafi yawe arondera ikimenyetso kiva kuri terefone yawe (signal de téléphone). Ikibanza urimwo gishobora kumenywa ku metero zike iyo uri mu gisagara mugabo kikamenywa ku metero nyinshi uri nka ruguru aho ata antene nyinshi ziriho. Nyamba uhamagaye canke uhamagawe, canke wanditse ubutumwa, ikibanza urimwo muruwo mwanya kirabikwa m'urutonde rw'uwutanga umuhora. Menya kwibi ariko bikora mumihora kwatari ukuronderwa (surveillance). Imihora yose iragira Triangulation y'ibimenyetso vya terefone yawe. Ibi ni nkenerwa kuvyibuka kuko bishobora gukoreshwa nabi kuri wewe.

## Terefone yanje irashobora gukoreshwa mu kunkurikirana?
![Kugira inama ama bateri yakuwemwo](12.png) 
Nigihe ushobora kuba utariko urakoresha terefone ngendanwa yawe, ishobora gukoreshwa nkaka microfone mwibanga nabandi kugira bakumvirize. Kuramwo ibateri yawe (ntiwugare terefone yawe gusa) canke shira terefone yawe kure yaho uri mugihe uriko ugira ibiyago atawukwiye kumenya.

Mwikoreshwa risanzwe, ubutumwa wanditse hamwe n'ihamagara ryawe bishobora gukurikiranwa n'uwutanga umuhora (fournisseur).
Ihamagara rishobora kumvirizwa hamwe nogukurikiranwa, n'intonde zishobora (bikurikije amategeko canke bitayakurikije) guhabwa uwundi muntu.
Intambwe zike ushobora kugira mu kwirinda:
• Gura amakarata SIM akora aruko arishe (prépayé), kandi arihamwe bishoboka wirinde kwiyandikisha ukoresheje izina ryawe. Koresha amahera kuko ama karata ya crédit canke aya banki ashobora kumenyekanisha ko ikarata arigwawe.
• Gura terefone ngendanwa isanzwe kandi izimbutse ataco bikubwiye kuyita arihamwe vyokenerwa
• Nyamba wibaza yuko uriko urakurikiranwa, ntute ikarata SIM yawe gusa, ute na terefone ngendanwa yawe.
• Wame wirinda minsi yose gusangira amakuru afise akabanga  nabandi kuri terefone ngendanwa yawe.

## IBINTU VYO KWIBUKA
• Ikarata SIM hamwe na terefone ngendanwa vyawe bishobora kukumenya
• terefone ngendanwa yawe ishobora kugukurikirana
• terefone ngendanwa yawe ishobora gukurikiranwa yumvirizwa (écoutes téléphoniques)
• Gendana amakarata SIM menshi yo mu mihora itandukanye ushobora guhindagura usubiriza iyo karata yawe. Nyamba bishoboka, gendana terefone irenga imwe 
• Kuramwo ibateri muri terefone yawe canke uyisige muhira igihe uzoba uriko ugenda guhura canke uva aho uhurira nabandi kugira wirinde ivya Triangulation bikoresha ama antenne y'imihora hamwe nogukurikiranwa mukibanza urimwo.
• Nyamba wibaza yuko uriko urakurikiranwa n'inzego, ikure ikarata sim hamwe na terefone vyawe wamye ukoresha.
• Gushira muri mode nkuko uri mundege (Airplane mode) suburyo buhumurije cane gusumba; terefone yawe irashobora kubandanya ishoboza uwayikoze kugushikira aciye kuvyo bite backdoor.
## Inyigisho ziri muriki cigwa zivanywe cane cane munyigisho zateguwe n'igikorwa ca Mobile Active’s now-closed Safer Mobile hamwe na Tibet Action Institute http://tibetaction.net.
